dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1862 EH: Global Child Protection Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to expand the scope of certain definitions pertaining to unlawful sexual conduct, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Global Child Protection Act of 2017.

section.header: Expanding the definition of illicit sexual conduct
section.text: Section 2423(f)(1) of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking a sexual act (as defined in section 2246) with and inserting any conduct involving; and
by striking if the sexual act and inserting if the conduct.

section.header: Expanding the definition of Federal sex offense
section.text: Section 3559 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting after 2244(a)(1) the following or 2244(a)(5);
by inserting or 2423(c) (relating to illicit sexual conduct) before the semicolon at the end; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (e)(3), by striking or 2423(a) and inserting , 2423(a), or 2423(c).

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives May 22, 2017.
